name: TypeSkater
description:
Press the "+" sign on the right side of the screen to show tricks and how to perform them, so you don't have to scroll to the desc in order to look up what to type.

Erase Input : Enter

Space - Push 

Type in:

oli - do an ollie

kcfp - do an kickflip

180 - do 180

cd - change direction while going switch after a 180

Sadly you can only do  "cd" and "180" while riding switch

Use + on the right side of the screen to show trick codes in-game
